source_objects.description: Communicate better with these powerful courses in written and verbal communications.
source_objects.title: Communication

items.title: Novel Writing Workshop
items.headline: Turn your idea into a published novel, step by step. Includes 27 video lessons!
objectives_summary: Turn Your Idea Into a Novel
Discover Your Dramatic Elements
Create a Premise that Sells

items.title: Dan Rather on Journalism & Finding the Truth in the News

visible_instructors.title: Dan Rather
visible_instructors.name: Dan
visible_instructors.job_title: Award Winning Journalist & Nightly News Anchor

items.headline: Learn to ask the right questions & tell captivating stories. Practical advice for journalists & avid news consumers.
objectives_summary: Analyze and investigate all news you consume and become more informed
Tell a compelling story, both on paper and in person, that moves audiences and effectively conveys your point of view
Produce sharp, concise writing that gets your message across and leaves the reader wanting more

items.title: Develop Blockbuster Story Ideas that Sell! (Writing Mastery)

visible_instructors.title: Jessica Brody
visible_instructors.name: Jessica
visible_instructors.job_title: International Bestselling Author and Writing Teacher

items.headline: Proven methods to unleash your creativity and brainstorm bestselling, high concept book and movie ideas
objectives_summary: Develop story ideas designed to get the attention of readers, agents, publishers, and producers
Learn why high-concept stories sell better, faster, and for more money
Define "high concept" and learn what makes an idea "high concept"

items.title: Productivity Hacks for Writers (Writing Mastery)

visible_instructors.title: Jessica Brody
visible_instructors.name: Jessica
visible_instructors.job_title: International Bestselling Author and Writing Teacher

items.headline: Simple strategies and proven techniques to be more productive and get the most out of every writing day
objectives_summary: Learn how to "hack" your brain, space, schedule, and devices to effortlessly get into the "writing zone" every single day
Dramatically improve your writing productivity in as little as days or weeks!
Tap into the incredible power of your brain with proven strategies and techniques to keep you laser focused on your writing

items.title: 3-Step Writing System: Blogging & Writing Secrets

visible_instructors.title: Tyler Speegle
visible_instructors.name: Tyler
visible_instructors.job_title: Huffington Post Contributor | Professional Writer & Blogger

items.headline: Blogging & writing tips for beginners to pros. Become an expert blogger/freelance writer. Ultimate blog writing course!
objectives_summary: Generate Viral Blog Ideas
Make Your Blog Stand Out and Get Noticed
Craft Killer Headlines

items.title: Drawing for Meetings, Presentations and Trainings
items.headline: Use Drawing and Graphic Facilitation to Make Your Meetings, Presentations and Trainings Memorable and Effective
objectives_summary: Draw the Basic Elements to Get Started - Shapes, Word Bubbles, Arrows and more
Draw Elements of Nature such as Plants, Land Animals and Sea Life
Draw Faces and Cartoon Characters

items.title: How To Reduce Constant Work Interruptions
items.headline: Reduce interruptions to regain control of your working day and dramatically increase productivity.
objectives_summary: Choose from a range of strategies and techniques that have proven to reduce the number of workplace interruptions and minimise the duration of interruptions.
You will be able to apply these proven strategies with the confidence that they work.
You will enjoy greater focus and increased productivity.

items.title: Modern Marketing with Seth Godin
items.headline: Highlights from The Marketing Seminar
objectives_summary: You'll be able to understand modern marketing, spread your ideas and gain empathy for those you seek to serve.
You'll understand that marketing is not the same as advertising.
You'll be able to focus on changing your product or service so that "marketing" it feels easy.

items.title: Reverse Engineer Riveting Fiction & Write Best Selling Books
items.headline: You will be writing page turning fiction that your readers will love when you plot, outline and write the right way.
objectives_summary: Outline best selling fiction books.
Improve any story by adding more tension and excitement.
Write quicker and easier with an outline as your guide.

items.title: 7 Lessons on Writing for Becoming a Standout Writer
items.headline: Tested Techniques for Fast Writing Skills Improvement
objectives_summary: Write clear, precise, and direct prose
Find alternative ways of constructing sentences
Communicate better with readers

items.title: Assert Yourself - Master the benefits of assertive behaviour
items.headline: How to develop confidence and communication skills to ensure positive outcomes from your interactions with others
objectives_summary: Communicate more effectively and improve their personal interactions.
Understand the disadvantages of aggressive and passive behaviour
Appreciate why how you make your point is just as important as what you say

items.title: Presentation Skills: Give a Great Team Presentation
items.headline: Presentation Skills: Learn how to give interesting, memorable presentations, as a group. No more boring data dumps
objectives_summary: Deliver team presentations
Practice team presentations
Create team presentations

items.title: Effective Presentation and TED like Public Speaking

visible_instructors.title: Evrim Kanbur
visible_instructors.name: Evrim
visible_instructors.job_title: Head of Business Management, Entrepreneur, TEDx Speaker

items.headline: Transform  your passion into performance through public speaking, presentation or storytelling
objectives_summary: Through each lecture you'll become more and more confident while taking your public speaking / presentation / storytelling skill to the next level
You'll be able ignite inner fire, educate, motivate and make an impact on your audience through implementing the right elements, technique and style.
Your speeches will be more memorable through which you'll be an unforgettable speaker.

items.title: Train the Trainer Pro: No Beginners Allowed!

visible_instructors.title: Jason Teteak
visible_instructors.name: Jason
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, YouTuber, Keynote & TEDx Speaker, CEO Rule the Room

items.headline: Leverage elite training techniques that set you apart and that every trainee wants to take again and again.
objectives_summary: How to immediately hook your class and get them salivating for what you are about to teach…even if they didn’t think they wanted to learn it
A guaranteed method to get “buy in” from even the most reluctant and challenging trainees and address all 4 learning styles of adults SIMULTANEOUSLY in your classroom
Q & A Maverick style: A comprehensive approach to answering questions that makes you look like an expert every time you answer a question

items.title: Mastering The Interview
items.headline: To present yourself well in the interview and to make a good impression, you should master the job interview.
objectives_summary: Understanding the Interview
Informational Interview
Getting Ready for Interview
